Package com.wikitude.common.permission

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PermissionManager
    Interface to the Wikitude permission manager.
    This can be used to check for runtime permissions.
    To get an instance of the PermissionManager WikitudeSDK.getPermissionManager() can be used.
    PermissionManager.PermissionManagerCallback
    Callbacks of the PermissionManager.
    It can be used to define what happens on the following events:
    PermissionManager.PermissionManagerCallback.permissionsGranted(int requestCode) PermissionManager.PermissionManagerCallback.permissionsDenied(String[]) PermissionManager.PermissionManagerCallback.showPermissionRationale(int, String[])
